actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal the provisions of that act permitting the employment of full-time students at less than the minimum wage required by that act.

summary.text: Repeals the provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 which permit the employment of full-time students at less than the minimum wage required by that Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal the provisions of that act permitting the employment of full-time students at less than the minimum wage required by that act.
